tasks.title: Forge the One Ring
tasks.description: Master the art of ring forging in the fires of Mount Doom.

tasks.title: Learn Elvish
tasks.description: Understand the basics of Sindarin and Quenya to communicate with the elves.

tasks.title: Prepare for Council of Elrond
tasks.description: Draft strategies and rehearse for the fellowship meeting.

tasks.title: Build a New Lightsaber
tasks.description: Find the right kyber crystal and construct a new lightsaber.

tasks.title: Master the Force
tasks.description: Learn advanced force techniques from a Jedi Master.

tasks.title: Prepare for Galactic Senate
tasks.description: Draft political arguments and rehearse for the Senate meeting.
